entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Outlook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Outlook 07:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: ENE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
